sentences.sContent: ‘Where are we going?’ he asked in a whisper.
You don’t have to whisper, no one can hear us.
sentences.sCn: 你不必轻声轻语，没人听得到我们说话。

words.tran: 传播流言蜚语的；发飒飒声的（等于whispery）
窃窃私语的人；拨弄是非的人；告密者
窃窃私语（whisper的过去分词）；低声地说

remMethod.val: whi(看作who) ＋ sper(看作speaker) → 谁在小声说话 → 低语， 耳语

trans.tranOther: a very quiet voice you make using your breath and no sound
to speak or say something very quietly, using your breath rather than your voice
